description: Cell culture specific parameters and protocols.
title: Cell culture details for biosample preparation

___culture_harvest_date.description: YYYY-MM-DD format date for the cell culture harvest.
___culture_harvest_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD ((TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___culture_harvest_date.title: Culture harvest date

___protocols_additional.description: Protocols including additional culture manipulations such as stem cell differentiation or cell cycle synchronization.
___protocols_additional.title: Additional Protocols used in Cell Culture

___karyotype.description: Chromosome count and any noted rearrangements or copy number variation
___karyotype.title: Karyotype Description

___authentication_protocols.description: One or more Protocol objects that are linked to authentication images or documents
___authentication_protocols.title: Authentications

___follows_sop.description: Flag to indicate if all the 4DN SOPs for the specified cell line was followed - Yes or No
___follows_sop.title: Follows SOP

___morphology_image.description: Photo of Cell Morphology at the time of collection
___morphology_image.title: Morphology Image

___doubling_number.description: The number of times the population has doubled since the time of thaw (culture start date) until harvest.
___doubling_number.comment: This may be reported in different ways - eg. 1) passage ratio and number of passages or 2) direct cell counts.
___doubling_number.title: Population Doubling Number

___doubling_time.description: The average time from thaw (culture start date) until harvest it takes for the population to double.
___doubling_time.comment: Researchers can record the number of times they split the cells and by what ratio as a simple approximation of doubling time. This is important for some cell lines eg. IMR90 (a mortal line) and HI and H9 human stem cells.
___doubling_time.title: Population Doubling Time

___tissue.description: The resulting tissue or cell type for cells that have undergone differentiation.
___tissue.title: Differentiation Tissue/Cell Type

___differentiation_state.description: For cells that have undergone differentiation (or serve as undifferentiated controls) a description of the differention state and markers used to determine the state.
___differentiation_state.title: Differentiation State

___description.description: A short description of the cell culture procedure - eg. Details on culturing a preparation of K562 cells
___description.title: Description

___passage_number.description: Number of passages since receiving original vial, including pyramid stocking and expansion since thawing the working stock, through to harvest date.
___passage_number.title: Passage Number

___synchronization_stage.description: If a culture is synchronized the cell cycle stage from which the biosample used in an experiment is prepared
___synchronization_stage.title: Synchronization Stage

___culture_start_date.description: YYYY-MM-DD format date for most recently thawed cell culture.
___culture_start_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD ((TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___culture_start_date.title: Culture start date

___culture_duration.description: Total number of culturing days since receiving original vial, including pyramid stocking and expansion since thawing the working stock, through to harvest date
___culture_duration.title: Total Days in Culture

___cell_line_lot_number.description: For 4DN Tier2 or unclassified cell lines - a lot number or other information to uniquely identify the source/lot of the cells
___cell_line_lot_number.title: Cell Line Lot

___in_vitro_differentiated.description: Relevant for pluripotent and stem cell lines - set to Yes if cells have undergone in vitro differentiation
___in_vitro_differentiated.title: Differentiated in vitro
